Reviews.Title: It was okay
Reviews.Author: Pitabug
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a gift for my birthday. I'm really interested in photography.So my parents thought this would be a good gift for me, but sadly they didn't look into any features, just the color. So I have found the camera to be troublesome.There are many problems I've found. One would be that it goes through batteries very quickly. I'm a college student so I don't have a lot of money to spend on batteries so it's a hassle. Another issue is the camera takes a pretty awful picture if flash is not used. It makes the pictures really distorted. The shutter speed is pretty slow as well, so taking action shots is not good for this camera. Also, the menu to change certain settings are very very limited. For example, I can't change the light exposure (tried this in hope to be able to take pictures outside to counteract the flash) or shutter speed.However, with all the negatives aside there are a few postives. Such as the nice color it comes in, amount of megapixels, the price, video, and cropping features. The megapixels for this camera are pretty decent, especially considering the inexpensive price. There is a nice little video feature where the camera also picks up audio. Another fun feature with this camera is you can crop a picture using the camera itself and you can put the picture in fun tones, such as black and white, sepia, blue, red, etc.Overall, this camera is pretty decent for someone who isn't worried about perfect pictures or isn't that into photography in the long run. This camera can take some gorgeous pictures, just it can take some time. This is a good camera for what it costs, and if anyone plans on buying it, make sure to have a memory card. Because at most, this camera can hold around 4 to 8 pictures. But this is found in most digital cameras with a decent amount of mega pixels.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for normal use!
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: I just got the camera because of the price and the color.for what it is...5 stars definitely.very small, comes with batteries,cables and even a silicone skin.I bought it to use for detailed up close pics of tiny objects for ebay.so no, not for me.But, for everyday pic taking of people and places...an excellent camera and a great deal for the money.I gave mine to my daughter and she loves it.A fabulous gift for a teenage girl!

Reviews.Title: Polaroid i735 7 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Frescura
Reviews.Content: It was hard to decide which digital camera to purchase for an 8 year old daughter at first.  After going to several different sites and comparing, this was the BEST purchase for the price and for a young person to start out with.My little girl enjoys taking pictures and showing them to us.  She can not stop thanking us.

Reviews.Title: Great for the kids
Reviews.Author: David Stambol
Reviews.Content: This item was purchased for a child in the 4th grade to take on a field trip. It worked perfectly. Was not too advanced for her and the picture quality was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Easy use camera.
Reviews.Author: H. Sanchez
Reviews.Content: ITs true, that this camera doesn't come with a memory card, but I was able to find one on amazon.com for only $3 from sandisk. Now it holds about 700 pictures. The memory card fits really tight in the memory card slot and I actually had to remove the batteries to get the memory card out. So thats not easy to use. Also the menu and appearance of the camera make it seem like it could be a knock off camera. Thank goodness for the packaging that has polaroid all over it otherwise I would have sent this back. Nonetheless, I would recommend this camera for the price of $50. If you're gonna spend $150.00 like this camera was originally priced at, you're better off buying another brand.

Reviews.Title: almost happy teenager
Reviews.Author: Ralph Trepanier "ralph t"
Reviews.Content: Well, a full featured camera, great capabilities, but burns through batteries at an alarming rate. Non-rechargable batteries last one day before camera loses functions, rechargable batteries also give up after a day or two, not useful for a teenager to plan for!

Reviews.Title: Polaroid i735 7 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.5-inch LCD
Reviews.Author: Vicki S. Duffy
Reviews.Content: I'm loving my new camera! It has been easy to use and easy to download pics on my computer.

Reviews.Title: cant believe it
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: thought it was too good to be true but I was wrong.  this camera is worth far more than the price!  great product, amazing price!

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Karen C. Miner "km"
Reviews.Content: Nice pocket camera, fairly user friendly the main thing I don't like is the long delay when pressing the shutter button other than that for its size it is great

Reviews.Title: great to use, clear pictures
Reviews.Author: Eliana M. Bunn "far from home"
Reviews.Content: I liked the camera, very easy to use, nice color for women, and very good unbeatable price.

Reviews.Title: polaroid i735
Reviews.Author: L. Schmadeke
Reviews.Content: The camera is a decent camera.  Its a little wierd at first but other wise easy once you play around with it.  functional. takes a little while to snap photos compared to my old camera, but still love it. :)

Reviews.Title: tried to return
Reviews.Author: John T. Booker
Reviews.Content: This camera offers a lot of features for the money - however, you'll spend the money on batteries that you saved on the orginal purchase price.  This was purchased for our 8 year old and she really enjoys taking pictures, but 2 AA batteries don't make it through one cay of pictures!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: K Woods "Kelliebellie"
Reviews.Content: The camera is great for what I wanted it for. If you are taking pictures of family, friends, and other odds and ends it works great. However, it is not a professional camera so do not expect professional quality pictures. If you are looking for digital camera that will take your family photos and pics of you and your friends having a good time the camera is well worth the money. It is great if you do not want to spend a lot of money for a descent camera. I would recommend this to any family member or friend.

Reviews.Title: Polaroid i735 camera is great
Reviews.Author: PC "PC"
Reviews.Content: This camera is especially good for kids...great quality, plus protective cover, and it takes AA batteries!

Reviews.Title: Polaroid Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert H. Damia "bdamia"
Reviews.Content: The value on this purchase is obvious...perfect for what it was purchased for (an extra camera that can be left in my wife's office)...truth be told? The display is better than the display on my $400 camera...the features leave other cameras "in the dust" and the battery life is remarkable...A GREAT DEAL...to be sure.

Reviews.Title: Eats away at batteries
Reviews.Author: Krissy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a surprise gift for my sister who moved away from home.  She did not have a camera and all of us back home wanted to see pictures of her new place.  Well, she has had the camera for over a month now and we have yet to see any pictures.  She says that every time she goes to take pictures, the batteries run out.  I knew this camera did not come with rechargeable batteries, but it is a bit ridiculous that the batteries last for such a short time.  I wish I would have spent $20 - $30 more and gotten her one that is better for every day use.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: A. Isakov "Kyrgyz Jigit"
Reviews.Content: It's the best bang for the buck. Does almost  everything it is supposed to. Good quality pictures, long battery life.

Reviews.Title: Snappy little camera
Reviews.Author: J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for our nine year grandaughter. The price is great though be alerted, you do need to buy a memory card($15 Best Buy).  Also, we discovered the batteries drain quickly with  the way a child  uses a camera....consider rechargable batteries. The camera takes nice pictures, has a good zoom and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Well, could be better.
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera don't get me wrong. But it doesn't come with a memory card. Which is no big deal but....it only holds up to 4 pictures without a memory card. Which if you want a memory card thats another $15.00. And it is a battery eater. 5 minutes playing around with it and it shuts off because of no batteries. That's another $5.00 to $10.00. Then that gets you back up to the price of a normal digital camera. So don't jump on this camera because it is a good price. Becuase they still charge you for shipping. (Super Saver Shipping for over $20), you'll want a meomory card so you can take up to more than 4 pictures, and rechargable batteries. Other than that it is a wonderful camera! The color is my favorite!

Reviews.Title: Horrible camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Avery
Reviews.Content: Although the price point is great, cheap is also one of its negatives! This camera is constantly freezing. You have to take the batteries out just to reset it. As for the image quality, it's rather poor!

Reviews.Title: For one of my grandaughters
Reviews.Author: Clifford R Woods Jr
Reviews.Content: Very good camera for my grandaughters bityjday.  She used is and was happy with it for years!  I thank you.

Reviews.Title: Buy something else!
Reviews.Author: Jo in OR "Jo"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and I hate it!  It takes lousy pictures, they aren't clear, the image stabilization is non-existant.  It eats batteries like crazy and it is always either too light or too dark on the pictures no matter how you adjust it.  I won't buy Polaroid again.

Reviews.Title: Good for money
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: It's not the simplest camera to use, and the picture quality isn't the greatest. But it packs more features and value for the money than anything else I could find. I was buying it for my 12 year old, so looking for something not expensive, but not a toy. This is it.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: L. Lehoucq
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter's 7th birthday, with the attitude that all the children's digital cameras for which I had read reviews were about the same price as this camera, and were pretty much across the board terrible.  I hoped this camera would take a bit better photos than a kid's camera, but not necessarily masterpieces.  This camera takes horrible photos.  When my daughter takes photos in the "auto" mode, they are almost always blurry and distorted.  I tried my hand at using the camera, and found that it was hit and miss whether I could get a good photo out of the camera.  For a 7 MP camera, the resolution of even the "good" photos is terrible.  All the photos were grainy.  Further, I have to change the batteries daily, and my daughter isn't taking a huge number of photos.  Yes, this is an inexpensive camera, but really it's just a cheap camera.  Save up your money for something that actually takes good quality photos and at least has a rechargeable battery.

Reviews.Title: OK for a basic camera, but battery life is deplorable.
Reviews.Author: K. Schiebel
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get a decent "beginner" digital camera for my 8-year-old daughter so was really attracted to this 7MP camera and she loved the color.  The price was what sold it though.  At $50, I wouldn't be as worried about how it was treated or if it got lost.My daugther really likes it and the pictures are decent, but the battery life is ridiculously short.  It takes 2 AA batteries and will generally die after a hour or so of collective use.The camera is OK, but if I had to do it over again, would have purchased a different camera.

Reviews.Title: good camera for a girl
Reviews.Author: Patricia Eggleston
Reviews.Content: My 9 yr old daughter loves the camera. It takes good pictures. Not as user friendly as would of liked. And the batteries go fast so I am buying her re-chargeable batteries. Good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great lil Cam
Reviews.Author: Briana Alice "Booboo"
Reviews.Content: I love my little camera. It is really easy to use. Definately worth the $50! With purchasing this nifty lil device I was also able to contribute a donation to Breast Cancer, as well! I would DEFINATELY reccomend this to anyone who wants a good digital camera that won't break the bank!

Reviews.Title: Polaroid i735 7 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.5-inch LCD
Reviews.Author: Aunt M
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with this purchase.  It was exactly as the seller advertised it to be, which is important.

Reviews.Title: works great ... great price
Reviews.Author: RobDad
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my 9 year old daughter... she loves it, and it takes pretty decent photos.  Not back for a[...] camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera and easy to use!!!
Reviews.Author: Snoopy09
Reviews.Content: My kids wanted a camera for trips this fit the bill and pink for breast cancer awareness you have to love that, supporting a great cause well enjoy this nice camera great price!!!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT price for quality of camera
Reviews.Author: Shauna R. Beavers
Reviews.Content: I haven't actually used the camera yet. It is a present for my niece who is a flowergirl in my wedding. I was blown away by the other reviews and most of all, the price of the camera for 7 megapixals. Its a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Not really for a little girl
Reviews.Author: D. Harris
Reviews.Content: The packaging is covered in the pink ribbons for breast cancer. I was planing on giving this pink camera to my young niece as a present, but i don't really want to have to explain the ribbons and the words all over it. I wish the packaging would have been shown or at least mentioned.

ProductInfo.Features:
7-megapixel resolution
3x optical zoom; 4x digital zoom
2.5-inch LCD screen; anti-shake image and video
ISO up to 1600; Ultra red-eye reduction
16 MB internal memory; capture images to SD memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid i735 7 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.5-inch LCD
